Class Popup

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.gui.util.Popup
public class Popup extends Object
Utility class to create informative popups.

  • Constructor Details

    • Popup

      public Popup()
      Creates a new popup with default settings. By default, popups have no content, can only be closed explicitly via the hide() method and have a semitransparent black background to draw attention to the popup.

  • Method Details

    • setParent

      public void setParent(javafx.scene.layout.Pane root)
      Sets the parent Pane in which this popup should appear.
      Parameters:
      root - The Pane in which this popup should appear.

    • setContent

      public void setContent(javafx.scene.Node content)
      Sets the content of this popup.
      Parameters:
      content - The content of this popup.

    • show

      public void show()
      Schedules the popup for display via the Platform.runLater(java.lang.Runnable) method.

    • hide

      public void hide()
      Schedules the popup to be hidden via the Platform.runLater(java.lang.Runnable) method.

    • setBackgroundColor

      public void setBackgroundColor(javafx.scene.paint.Paint backgroundColor)
      Sets this popup's background color.
      Parameters:
      backgroundColor - The background color, a semi-transparent black by default.

    • removeBackgroundColor

      public void removeBackgroundColor()
      Removes this popup's background color.

    • setAutoHide

      public void setAutoHide(boolean autoHide)
      Sets whether this popup should hide automatically when the user clicks outside the popup.
      Parameters:
      autoHide - The auto hide property value, false by default.
